dialog.line: Hey Will. Can I ask you something?
'Spose
You look as miserable as anything these days. Even Justine's noticed. What's up?
Nothing.
Yeah but there is something, isn't there?
No.
Yes there is. I know you try to hide it.
Honestly Dad, there's nothing, I'm ok. Everything's ok.
So what are you doing this weekend?
Dunno, why?
Just wondering if you were going to see anyone. Haven't seen any of your mates around here lately.
Yeah, well. No, I don't expect I'll be seeing them this weekend either.
Argument or something?
No.
So who do you walk to school with these days?
Please Dad, honestly there's nothing wrong. Maybe I just don't like that crowd as much as I did.
Maybe they don't like you...
Oh great, take their side. It's all my fault is it?
What's all your fault?
Nothing.
Is being an f**ing n***** your fault?
That's really out of order reading my emails.
I didn't read it Will. Justine knows your password and was putting something on the computer to try and make you laugh. She saw the title of the email.
It's none of her business.
Will, yes it is. She thinks you look really unhappy, that's her business cos she's your sister. What would you do if you saw emails like that sent to her?
